title.rendered: ClinLab Staffing Ranks on Inc. 5000 List of America’s Fastest-Growing Companies

content.rendered:
Inc. Magazine revealed that Watertown, MA- based ClinLab Staffing is No. 1110 on its 37th annual Inc. 5000 list, the most prestigious ranking of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies.

ClinLab Staffing has also been ranking by Inc. Magazine as #20 fastest growing human resources companies and #21 in Massachusetts overall for the Inc. 5000 2018 list.

The list represents a unique look at the most successful companies within the American economy’s most dynamic segment—its independent small businesses. Microsoft, Dell, Domino’s Pizza, Pandora, Timberland, LinkedIn, Yelp, Zillow, and many other well-known names gained their first national exposure as honorees on the Inc. 5000.

“To be recognized in the Inc. Top 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies is an honor and recognition of our team’s dedication to supporting the staffing needs of some of the top pharmaceutical & biotech organizations in America,” said ClinLab Staffing CEO, Andrius Montvila. “We work very hard to provide successful, reliable staffing solutions, and will continue to do so as we advance and grow to support life science organizations with their most critical staffing, recruiting and placement needs.”

About ClinLab Staffing

ClinLab Staffing is a leader in the scientific staffing & executive search industry. Headquartered in Watertown, Massachusetts, ClinLab is committed to driving workforce solutions for startup, mid-sized and large life science, biotech, medical and scientific companies. With an unrivaled network, a deep expertise and broad market intelligence, our team of seasoned client managers and recruiters are uniquely positioned to provide industry-leading services and support. For more information, please visit www.clinlabstaffing.com
